channel.title: Globalobjects PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
ok when i try to add a global object such as a bank booth, its not appearing! I have global objects in my server, and i even tried to move an object but its not appearing.
SOMEONE PLEASE HELP!

item.title: Globalobjects PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @laxmaster213 laxmaster213
item.description:
@laxmaster213 wrote:

OK in your client.java look for this

public void NewObjects() {

or atleast close to that

then under that you will see this

makeGlobalObject(2602, 4775, 2213, -1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3220, 3427, 2213, 2, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3221, 3427, 2213, -1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3221, 3428, 2213, -1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3221, 3429, 2213, -1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3221, 3430, 2213, -1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3216, 3438, 2213, 2, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3221, 3433, 2213, -1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3221, 3434, 2213, -1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3221, 3435, 2213, -1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3221, 3436, 2213, -1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3216, 3427, 2213, 2, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3217, 3427, 2213, 2, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3218, 3427, 2213, 2, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3219, 3427, 2213, 2, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3206, 3427, 2213, 2, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3207, 3427, 2213, 2, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3208, 3427, 2213, 2, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3209, 3427, 2213, 2, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3210, 3427, 2213, 2, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3205, 3430, 2213, -1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3205, 3429, 2213, -1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3205, 3428, 2213, -1, 10); // bank
well yours would be different then yours but you get the point

Then you could just copy one of the codes for the bank then change the corrds and the direction.

compile and run your server!

makeGlobalObject(x, y, i, d, 10); // bank

X= x corrd
Y= y corrd
I= object id
D= direction

I hope this helps!

Read full topic
